text:
@WhiteHouse - Denying Covid-19 in January and February
- Wouldn't help the states to battle the virus
- Made the virus political
- Can't say black lives matter
- Build fences around the @WhiteHouse first time ever
- Send alphabet agencies upon harmless protestors
- Destroys the envorinment

entity.name: The Voice : la plus belle voix
entity.description: Découvrez les coulisses : le débrief du prime, les réactions à chaud, le bêtisier et des images exclusives des coachs, dans un late show à l'américaine. Nikos mènera les discussions avec les coachs dans une proximité et une franchise inédites.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
